item.description:
We golf in the land Down Under! Welcome to Golf Diaries, where Skratch takes you to amazing courses and happenings around the world of golf and beyond. On this edition, our Man at Work and resident Aussie, Zane Moulton, showcases Melbourne where he gets a great sense of the current golf culture around the iconic Australian Open, headlined this year by Grand Slam winner Rory McIlroy.
